title: Concave Down
text: If a function is concave down, it indicates that $$\operatorname{f''}\left(x\right)<0$$ for the interval I.

title: Considering an Example
text: Consider the function $$f(x)=\sqrt{x}$$. Is f''(x) positive or negative?
